songs.title: Eternally Missed
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
Chase your dreams away
Glass needles in the hay
The sun forgives the clouds
You are my holy shroud

[Chorus 2]
I just don't care if it's real
That won't change how it feels
I just don't care if it's real
That won't change how it feels
No, it doesn't change

[Chorus 3]
You can't resist
Making me feel eternally missed
You can't resist
You can't resist
Making me feel...

Chase your dreams away
Glass needles in the hay
The sun forgives the clouds
You are my holy shroud

That won't change how it feels
I just don't care if it's real
That won't change how it feels
No, it doesn't change

You can't resist
You can't resist
Making me feel...

You can't resist
You can't resist
Making me feel...
